name: NHL SuperCard 2K18
summary:
NHL SuperCard, the action-packed NHL collectible card-battling game 
 
NHL SuperCard is the action-packed NHL collectible card-battling game. Featuring cover athlete Zach Parise, NHL All-Star, 2014 U.S. Olympic Team Captain and left wing for the Minnesota Wild, NHL SuperCard is available for download free of charge on the App Store for iOS devices, including the iPhone, iPad and iPod touch, as well as the Google Play Store and Amazon Appstore for Android devices.
